creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: window with scalloped top archway and view of rock and branches; wooden elements on white wall; blue and grey horizontal elements at top; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Seal

in left  LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [Window & Stone G
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Window and Stone Garden
